name: Ucube Bolt
description:
Inside the Machine, it is on the edge of being surmounted by The Red Dude, only YOU can preserve the world; Run, Beat The Malevolent and Be The Most Expeditious Cube in Existence!

Ucube Bolt  The game to those who love speedruns that leave you wanting to beat your previous time and scores, while having a tons of fun beating enemies, jumping over obstacles and defeating the Boss. How To Play? No Explicit Tutorial lol (It's a Wildcard!) Don't Stop, Keep Running; Beat the Boss and Be A Hero

Submission for:

VimJam 2: Boss [8 Bits to Infinity]

Hosted by 8 Bits to Infinity, Vimlark, Joshua McLean · #8bitstoinfinity

Limitation (Required): Create a game featuring a "boss" - however you interpret that 

Theme (Semi-Optional): ON THE EDGE 

Ucube is on the edge of becoming a Hero, beat the boss and become a boss HIMSELF ;)

and

Godot Wild Jam #37

Hosted by Bakenshake · #godotwildjam

The official theme for the jam is: "Inside The Machine"

If you notice close enough, the maps are designed like a Machine. Ucube need to save the machine from destruction lol

Speedruns & High Scores

How? Please comment below and Screenshot as proof :)

Who am I?

Nihao Bro, I am Simping Tuna, a tuna on the web :) I am new to GameDev, and this is my Second Jam Entry, made with Godot.

Assets:

Cute Sprites and Awesome Tutorial for Beginners by GDQuest. Thank you so much! (including each of you who played my game💗)

Rate if you enjoy it, if you don't then feel free to comment down below so I can improve :)
